long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The WyeSoft Chess Chrome extension gives you easy access to the various features of WyeSoft Chess, and monitors your chess games, alerting you when it's your move.  Pinning the icon to your address bar allows you to tell (by its colour) if it's your move in a game, or if you've received a game request.  Notification popups and sounds can also be enabled.
